Dating: KINGDOM OF KUSH (not before); MEROITIC PERIOD (not after)
Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; PAINTED
Name: Pottery sherd
Description: A pottery sherd of very fine cream ware. The decoration consists of a falcon with outstretched wings, the facial markings and feather pattern are detailed. There appears to be something leading from the falcon's beak but the rest is lost. Above the picture is a red band.
